name: Forever Close to Me
overview:
Forever Close to Me offers personalized photo pillows that can be used in any situation.

Special gifts with a personal touch are very hard to find. We can help with our “Sweet Memories” and Keepsake pillows made here in the U.S.A.

These personalized photo pillows are customized to your specifications with your favorite photo and inscription.

Our exclusive 16x20” “Sweet Memories” pillow includes a 400 t.c. 100% cotton pillow cover and pillow case along with two satin pouches to hold mementos. These can then be placed inside of our one of a kind pillow.

Our 17x17” Keepsake pillow comes with a 400 t.c. cotton pillow cover and is the perfect way to display your favorite photos.

Here’s how it works: You send or email us a photo. You then have the choice of enhancing it with one of our backgrounds or adding your own personal message. We then email you a proof to make sure you are totally satisfied with the image before transferring it onto your pillow.

It’s that simple. You can see exactly what you will receive.

Visit us at foreverclosetome.com and read our testimonials along with examples details of our products. We pay very close attention to detail to make sure you are completely satisfied with your pillow.
